Sure! Here is the extracted text:

---

**1**  Mark for Review  
The length of each side of triangle A is 270 millimeters. The length of each side of triangle B is double the length of each side of triangle A. What is the length, in millimeters, of each side of triangle B?

A) 270  
B) 272  
C) 540  
D) 1,080  

---

questions.question_text: The length of each side of triangle A is 270 millimeters. The length of each side of triangle B is double the length of each side of triangle A. What is the length, in millimeters, of each side of triangle B?
questions.explanation: Each side of triangle B is double that of triangle A, so 270 * 2 = 540 millimeters.
